name: Blog
body:
### Shaders in Codea

Here is a small example of using a light shader in Codea 1.5, where the light is in the same direction as the gravity.

`vShade = (dot(nor.xyz,light)+0.2)/1.2;`

[gist for the code](https://gist.github.com/4690383.js)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
